name: GUIDE: A game demo
description:
GUIDE is a narrative-focused, 3D game project that explores storytelling in games and the ways in which designers can enhance the player’s narrative experience through gameplay design.

The game was designed as part of my final year university project and developed with the Unreal Engine.

In the game, you play as a Guide, a spirit whose job is to find lost souls in limbo and lead them to their afterlife, learning more about them, and yourself, in the process.
